SEARCH
Module photos
Package controller

Class DisplaySearchRes

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
controller.DisplaySearchRes
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class DisplaySearchRes extends javafx.stage.Stage
The DisplaySearchRes class controls the user interface for displaying search results. Creates a new album from the search results, navigates through photos, displays photo information, managing tags, returning to the main application window, and quitting the application.
Author:
Zaaim Rashid invalid input: '&' Zuhayr Rashid
